channel.title: (matrix 718 client) changing background image?
channel.description: hey guys, i am editing the background on the matrix client, i have alredy produce an image i want to use, ive alredy cropped it and everything, but when i add it as a frame to cache editor and try to add it to my cache it gives me an image quality error, now ive read a tut on how to do this and it says change something in photoshop to 256, im not using photoshop, cuz im a cheapass and im using paint.net :) anyways it says something about reducing the images quality or remove child sprites, how would i reduce the image quality on paint.net, even if you could tell me how to do it on paint. thanks (im using matrix 718 client, and rune evo source)

item.title: (matrix 718 client) changing background image?
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

hey guys, i am editing the background on the matrix client, i have alredy produce an image i want to use, ive alredy cropped it and everything, but when i add it as a frame to cache editor and try to add it to my cache it gives me an image quality error, now ive read a tut on how to do this and it says change something in photoshop to 256, im not using photoshop, cuz im a cheapass and im using paint.net anyways it says something about reducing the images quality or remove child sprites, how would i reduce the image quality on paint.net, even if you could tell me how to do it on paint. thanks (im using matrix 718 client, and rune evo source)
